alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 05 at 2:35PM PDT until November 09 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From 10 PM Sunday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Be prepared for winter driving conditions. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
